content: when putting the skeins on the shelf i couldn t resist putting these two colors next to each other they complement one another so well now here they are united at last in this gorgeous cowl if these colors don t strike your fancy look for a solid or semi-solid when choosing your main color this cowl comes in two sizes a small one 22 inches around that fits close around your neck and a larger one 42 inches around that can be wrapped twice both cowls are 9 inches high but can be made taller if you choose
